translation.en: Leave them so far behind that…
that it's like you never met?
Look, G, I just want you to know that I support you
in whatever decision you want to make.
I know you're trying to be sweet right now
and that you're worried about me.
Let's do it. I'm serious. Let's get married.
They're here. I don't wanna make them wait.
[woman 2] I want you to order a self-drive on the way home.
-Don't let anyone drive you. Okay? -[woman] Okay.
[woman 2] Sam, you're backing me up on this, right?
Yes, Mr. and Mrs. Olsen, I got you.
Whose parents are gonna be there?
No one's parents, Dad. We're in college.
-You look a little green around the gills. -I'm fine, Mom. I'm just…
translation.ko: 괜찮아? 안색이 안 좋은데 괜찮아요, 엄마 그냥…

translation.en: -Can I have my coat, please, Eli? -[Eli] Yes, ma'am.
It's mine. And I want it back.
[woman] Uh, my purse too. Thank you.
[Mr. Olsen] Have fun, you two. Be safe.
Yes, sir, we won't be out too long. Good night, Mrs. Olsen.
translation.ko: - 조심하고 - 네, 늦지 않게 올게요 안녕히 주무세요, 아주머니

translation.en: Raster Robotics has delivered cutting-edge AI…
translation.ko: 래스터 로보틱스는 최첨단 가정용 AI를 제공했습니다

translation.en: -Hold up. Does this have rum in it? -Uh, it does not, sir.

translation.ko: 좋아, 대니얼 샷 한 잔씩 돌려

translation.en: I'm sorry, your parents put a restriction on shots served.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 부모님께서 샷은 못 돌리게 하셨습니다

translation.en: -Do you have my phone? I can't find it. -No, I don't. Did you leave it?
translation.ko: 내 전화기 갖고 있어? 못 찾겠네 없는데, 두고 왔어?

translation.en: Fuck. Did I not give it to you?
-Let me take that for you, G. -What?

translation.ko: - G, 술 마시면 안 돼 - 이러지 마

translation.en: Yo, are you two fighting? You seem like you're fighting.
translation.ko: 둘이 싸우는 거야? 싸우는 것 같네

translation.en: [announcer] Get the new OS this Christmas from Raster Robotics.
[man 1] Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch the elbows.
I've got it, sir. Not to worry. [man 1] Is this the first time you ever played, huh?
translation.ko: - 제가 치우죠, 걱정 마십시오 - 게임 하루 이틀 해?

translation.en: He's trying to be so sweet.
And… I'm not ready for this.
I'm not even sure that I wanna be with him.
That's why he's being so fucking dumb right now.
[woman 3] So what are you gonna do?
No, no, no! Stop, stop, stop!
Go! Go to the front door! Go--
[Sam] G, go back! Go back! Go back!
They're not supposed to be able to do that.
They're programmed not to be able to do that.
-[woman 3] I've got to call my mom. -[Sam] Shit!
[Sam] You said you wanted something to do with nature.
[Georgia] Uh, yeah, sure. But I meant…
I don't know, something like… [inhales sharply]
[Sam] Right. Because River is so much better than Leaf.
[Georgia] All right, forget nature. What's your first choice for a girl?
translation.ko: 자연은 됐고 딸 이름으로는 뭐가 좋아?

translation.en: How are you so sure that this is a baby girl?
I don't know. I can tell.
I'm telling you it's a boy.
Yeah, you also had a dream you gave birth to a pony.
-No, I didn't. -You having a pony too?
-No, I didn't. When? -Oh my God. Yes, you did.
You told me you were gonna break up with me when I said we can ride that pony.
translation.ko: 내가 그 조랑말 같이 타자니까 헤어지자면서

translation.en: -I think it's just an animal. -[Georgia] Come on.
Come on, babe, we got to get going.
Keep telling you, you need to get the All Stars.
[Georgia] We've gotta clear six miles by sundown.
As long as we stay away from the road, I think we'll be okay.
I'm always afraid they're gonna shoot us.
Just do what they say. Move slowly.
Put your packs down and turn around.
Uh, yeah, we have a machete and a revolver.
What's the girl hiding under her shirt?
One at a time. You, go ahead.
translation.ko: 한 명씩 들어와 넌 들어오고, 넌 거기 서

translation.en: Put your palm up against this fence.
Put your palm up on the fence.
No. No, no, no, you're over there.
[woman] Where are you guys coming from?
[Georgia] After the Blitz, we thought things would just get better.
translation.ko: 기습 이후로 상황이 나아질 줄 알고

translation.en: We waited out for a few months, and then we tried to get to New York.
translation.ko: 몇 달 기다렸다가 뉴욕으로 가려고 했어요

translation.en: And then, on our way to New York, they detonated the electronic pulse thing.
translation.ko: 그런데 뉴욕으로 가는 길에 전자기 펄스탄을 터뜨리더라고요

translation.en: Yeah. Grunt freaked out and triggered it during an attack.
translation.ko: 네, 졸병이 겁에 질려서 공격 중에 발사해버렸죠

translation.en: Once the EMP blast radius went down,
the next wave of androids swarmed the soldiers and…
Well, that was the end of New York City.
[Georgia] We ended up looping back up the long way.
And now we're… [sighs] …trying to get to Boston.
[woman] Boston is fortified, but you can't get straight there.
translation.ko: 보스턴은 요새화됐지만 곧장 갈 순 없어요

translation.en: [woman] The area surrounding it is no-man's-land.
Gonna be tough unless you can figure out a way to come in from the sea.
translation.ko: 바다를 통해 가는 게 아니라면 힘들 거예요

translation.en: I wouldn't risk it while you're this far along.
translation.ko: 이런 만삭의 몸으로는 안 가는 게 좋아요

translation.en: [Georgia] Oh, um, I… I can ask you.
Uh, when I give birth, I know that I have to cut the umbilical cord.
I read it that I have to.
How do I get it out of me? Is it just gonna fall out or--
translation.ko: 제 몸에선 어떻게 빼요? 그냥 빠지나요?

translation.en: [woman] You can have the baby here.
[woman] I mean, you're past due. You really shouldn't be traveling at all.
[Georgia] Sam wants us to get to Boston before I give birth.
translation.ko: 샘이 출산 전에 보스턴으로 가자고 했어요

translation.en: We're trying to get to this.
Families with a child one year or younger,
translation.ko: 한 살 이하의 아이가 있는 가족은

translation.en: they qualify to take a boat somewhere safe.
translation.ko: 한 살 이하의 아이가 있는 가족은 배로 아시아 같은 안전한 곳으로 보낸대요
배로 아시아 같은 안전한 곳으로 보낸대요

translation.en: Have you heard anything about it?
Yeah. Um, couple of months ago, this is what everyone was doing.
translation.ko: 네, 두 달 전인가 다들 그렇게 떠났죠

translation.en: In the spring. Why? Did you hear something?
I can ask around for you,
but I heard they were only taking the mothers and babies.
translation.ko: 사람들에게 물어볼 순 있는데 엄마와 아기만 데려가고

translation.en: [Sam] Yo, what's up, man? Can I get one of those?
You, uh, you know if they got any shipments going to Boston?
Anyone I can hitch a ride with?
My girl's pregnant, and we're trying to cut through the no-man's-land.
translation.ko: 여자 친구가 임신해서 무인 지대를 통과하려고요

translation.en: No one's getting through no-man's-land. That's why it's called no-man's-land.
translation.ko: 무인 지대는 아무도 통과 못 해 그래서 무인 지대지

translation.en: Yeah. I just mean, maybe there's a way for us to get to Boston.
They got a strong holdout because of the troops and the EMPs.
translation.ko: 군대와 EMP 덕에 철벽 방어를 하고 있지만

translation.en: But all it takes is one domino.
You can only detonate it once.
Takes out everything with an electrical current within its blast radius.
translation.ko: 살상 반경 내에서 전류가 흐르는 건 싹쓸이하지

translation.en: Then all we got is guns.
Get us to blow an EMP
so they can get up nice and close.
You, uh, you know if they still shipping people out?
translation.ko: 혹시 지금도 사람들이 배를 타고 떠나나요?

translation.en: You trying to hop over to China?
Yeah. I bet they still have boats.
I'm not trying to run from this.
[man] Please, I told you I had a hip replacement. Listen to me!
translation.ko: 고관절 치환술 받았다니까요 제 말 좀 들어주세요!

translation.en: [man 2] I don't know about no hip replacement.
translation.ko: 고관절 치환술은 모르겠고 탐지기에 불이 들어오잖아

translation.en: All I know is you light up my detector. Now step back!
translation.ko: 고관절 치환술은 모르겠고 탐지기에 불이 들어오잖아 물러서!

translation.en: [man] Please! You wanna cut me open? You wanna see? I bleed red just like you.
translation.ko: 제발요! 꺼내서 보여드려요? 보실래요? 저도 당신처럼 붉은 피가 흘러요!

translation.en: [man 2] Hey, you got metal in your bones.
-You got five seconds to back off! -[man] Please.
-[man 2] Five! Get off the fence! Three! -[man] No, please. They said they--
translation.ko: - 제발요! - 5, 울타리에서 떨어져, 3 제발요, 여기 오면 살려준댔는데…

translation.en: [Georgia] The doctor hasn't heard anything about the Family Initiative for weeks.
translation.ko: 의사가 가족 이니셔티브 소식은 몇 주째 못 들었대

translation.en: [Sam] I talked to a soldier. He said they still got boats going out of Boston.
translation.ko: 병사에게 물어봤더니 지금도 보스턴에서 배가 뜬대

translation.en: Why would they still have boats if they're not taking families?
We got days of walking left,
and we gotta get through no-man's-land without being noticed.
translation.ko: 들키지 않고 무인 지대를 통과해야 한다고

translation.en: It's not gonna be easy with Baby Boy with us.
translation.ko: 우리 아들을 데리고 가기는 쉽지 않을 거야

translation.en: If you can find a safe way for us to go,
the soldiers can give us a ride or something…
Fuck. I wish we still had the Internet.
What if they only take one of us?
translation.ko: 우리 중 한 명만 데려가면 어떡해?

translation.en: only taking the mothers and the babies.
She said they might not take you.
I mean, I… I guess… I guess you and the baby get on the boat, and I'll…
translation.ko: 그럼 너랑 아기는 배를 타고 나는…

translation.en: I'll just figure something else out, G.
Wait, what? That's not what I wanna hear.
I wanna hear that we're in this together.
That's what I thought that we were doing. -That-- -It is what we're doing.
That we could have just gotten rid of this, but we didn't.
translation.ko: 아기를 지울 수도 있었지만 안 그랬잖아

translation.en: And this baby's on its way, Sam.
You're trying to put me on a boat by myself so I'm not your responsibility.
translation.ko: 근데 날 책임지기 싫어서 배에 태우겠다고?

translation.en: You asked me what I thought.
You're throwing a bunch of what-ifs at me. I'm trying to do the right thing.
translation.ko: 혹시라도 그렇게 되면 옳은 선택을 하겠다는 거야

translation.en: What part of putting me on a boat by myself
You're being very hormonal right now.
I am allowed to have emotions! This is not me being hormonal!
translation.ko: 나도 감정이 있어 호르몬 문제가 아니라고!

translation.en: I should have just broken up with you.
-I'm gonna go get us a ride. -[door zipping]
Don't worry. I'm not abandoning you or whatever.
[man] We got a special treat for you tonight.
This is no android right here.
I know it looks too good to be true.
This is 100% USDA prime beef right here.
[Sam] Yo, man, how can I get a ride to Boston?
translation.ko: 저기요, 보스턴행 차는 어떻게 얻어 타죠?

translation.en: You could fight me for it.
[man 2] Convoy's going up to Nashua tomorrow.
It'd get you just about as close as anyone can get.
translation.ko: 그거 타면 최대한 근처까지 갈 수 있을 거다

translation.en: Yeah. All you gotta do is…
All you gotta do is put me flat on my back,
and you got yourself a ride.
What's it gonna be, little man?
And you rock till you drop.
Can you come out here, please?
[Georgia] Sam. What the fuck did you do to him?
translation.ko: 샘? 샘한테 무슨 짓을 한 거예요?

translation.en: He was fighting with a patrol officer last night.
[man] I got a man with a busted skull who's blind in one eye.
translation.ko: 두개골을 깨트리고 한쪽 눈을 멀게 만들었죠

translation.en: No. No, I… I'm sorry, but that… that can't be what happened.
[man] I can account for a certain amount of rowdiness among the soldiers,
translation.ko: 병사들 사이에 약간의 소동은 용인할 수 있지만

translation.en: but I will not tolerate a guest on my base whaling on my boys.
translation.ko: 객식구가 내 병사를 때리는 건 용납 못 합니다

translation.en: What are you… what are you going to do to him?
Lady, I'm fighting a fucking war here against an enemy that literally never sleeps,
translation.ko: 우리는 잠도 안 자는 적을 상대하고 있습니다

translation.en: whose main objective is to wipe us off the face of the earth.
translation.ko: 놈들 목표는 지구상에서 인간을 말살하는 거죠

translation.en: We've got half a platoon, most of them barely trained.
translation.ko: 우린 소대 절반 규모에 훈련도 제대로 못 받았는데

translation.en: And I do not need a couple of kids too chickenshit to enlist,
translation.ko: 입대할 배짱도 없는 한낱 쫄보 때문에 병사를 잃을 순 없습니다

translation.en: putting any of them out of commission.
translation.ko: 한낱 쫄보 때문에 병사를 잃을 순 없습니다

translation.en: You're no longer welcome on this base.
Sir, I don't think you understand. I have permission from Dr. Howe--
translation.ko: 잘 모르시나 본데 전 하우 박사님께 허락받았어요

translation.en: -[slams fist] -Yes, I've spoken to Dr. Howe.
You got two minutes to get off my fucking base.
before I signal the other outposts and tell them not to let you in.
translation.ko: 다른 기지에도 발 못 들이게 할까요?

translation.en: -[Sam] Come on, man! Come on! -[soldier 1] Let's go. Keep moving.
[Dr. Howe] Some painkillers. Some hydrogen peroxide. And medical gloves for him.
translation.ko: 진통제, 과산화수소랑 남자분이 쓸 의료용 장갑이에요

translation.en: I got a machete and a revolver in there.
I wish I could do more, but it's all I can spare.
Cut the umbilical cord close to your baby and tie it off.
The part connected to you will expel itself an hour after you give birth.
translation.ko: 몸속 탯줄은 출산하고 한 시간쯤 후에 빠질 거예요

translation.en: Hey, women have been giving birth
since way before people started calling themselves doctors.
[Sam] Ma'am, please. I had a revolver as well. I came--
translation.ko: - 제발요, 권총도 있었어요 - 난 모르는 일이야

translation.en: -[soldier 2] I don't know about it. -I got a baby on the way.
translation.ko: - 제발요, 권총도 있었어요 - 난 모르는 일이야 곧 아기가 태어나요 여자 친구가 임신했다고요
곧 아기가 태어나요 여자 친구가 임신했다고요

translation.en: Look, there are androids out there, and it's just us. Please.
translation.ko: 사방이 안드로이드 천지인데 우리 둘뿐이잖아요, 제발요

translation.en: Look, G, I'm sorry that I was--
G, I was trying to get us a ride so that we could go to Boston.
translation.ko: 보스턴으로 갈 차를 얻어 타려고 그랬던 거야

translation.en: You don't think I can protect you, but I can.
You asshole. You dumb asshole! Asshole! You fucking asshole!
[Sam] When the rain dies down, I'll try to start a fire.
-What's going on, baby? Is it time? -No.
Look, G, I didn't find a towel, but--
We are not having sex tonight, so don't you dare look at me.
translation.ko: 오늘은 섹스 안 할 거야 쳐다보지 마

translation.en: I'm still so mad at you for being so dumb.
translation.ko: 네 한심한 짓 때문에 아직도 화나

translation.en: -It was so fucking dumb, Sam. -I know. I know.
I'm sorry for saying what I said.
I don't know. I was just being…
Ugh! Please tell me there's a mattress somewhere in this house I can sleep on.
translation.ko: 이 집에 매트리스 있으면 정말 좋겠다

translation.en: My spine feels like it's gonna shatter.
-Do you want me to help you? -[muffled] Take this.
This camera has one more photo in it,
translation.ko: 이 카메라에 필름 한 장 남았어

translation.en: can have an actual real-life family photo.
translation.ko: 진짜 가족사진을 찍을 수 있다는 거지

translation.en: We are not naming our baby Spruce.
Everything we've heard about Boston is that it's surrounded.
[sighs] So we'd have to go up north.
[sighs] And then we'd have to find a boat or something to bring us back down into Boston Harbor.
And there's the boat stuff, which…
I don't know how to figure that out.
And how long to cut straight through?
We would have to be silent.
We should have the baby here.
We make such a big deal about giving birth, but…
translation.ko: 우리는 출산이 대단한 일인 줄 알지만

translation.en: women used to give birth and then,
I don't know, cut the umbilical cord with their teeth and keep on hunting.
Oh, what, so you're a hunter now?
Once the baby's here, we could just take our time.
Take the long way. It's dry here.
translation.ko: 길게 보는 거야 여기는 비도 안 새잖아

translation.en: We've been lugging that medical dictionary around for six months now.
Think it'll ever go back to normal?
I mean, I don't even know if it should.
But I do think it could be good still.
I got it to turn over a second ago.
Take it you saw the mass grave, huh?
Yeah, but why? We can't take it.
translation.ko: 응, 근데 왜? 그건 못 타

translation.en: 'Cause it will attract too much attention.
We'll just go on foot once the baby's here.
Look, G, I know you're not gonna like this,
but I need you to hear me out.
You could have this baby today or in a week.
translation.ko: 아기는 오늘 태어날지도 몰라 아니면 일주일 후에

translation.en: And I don't feel good about waiting on the edge of no-man's-land,
translation.ko: 무인 지대에서 아무도 우리를 못 찾길 바라면서

translation.en: And if we take this bike, we can get there by the end of the day.
translation.ko: 이 오토바이를 타면 오늘 밤에 도착할 수 있어

translation.en: What… happened to going quietly, Sam?
Let's say you have the baby,
and we pull off the home birth by ourselves.
who screams when he's hungry or when it's cold.
translation.ko: 아기는 배고파서 울고 춥다고 울 거야

translation.en: We've been sneaking around so far,
but we're not gonna be able to do that anymore.
Let's say we can stay quiet enough to make it up to New Hampshire.
translation.ko: 소리 내지 않고 뉴햄프셔에 간다 치자

translation.en: What kind of boat are we gonna get? A motorboat?
I don't know how to sail, G. Do you?
translation.ko: 난 항해하는 법 몰라, 넌 알아?

translation.en: I see a way that we can do this.
A way to make it okay.
G, I know you think I can't protect you, but I would kill for you.
translation.ko: 내가 못 미덥겠지만 널 위해서라면 살인도 하겠어

translation.en: And I would do the same for our baby.
Let me just fix this bike
so we can get the hell out of this dumb situation.
translation.ko: 이 말도 안 되는 상황에서 벗어나자

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Bet you want some All Stars now, don't you?
Get your shit, G. Let's go.

translation.ko: - 따돌렸어? - 잠깐만 - G, 따돌렸어? - 응, 따돌린 것 같아

translation.en: -G, did we lose him? -I think we lost him.
translation.ko: - G, 따돌렸어? - 응, 따돌린 것 같아

translation.en: -[Sam] Fuck, G! -Come on. Go! Don't slow down!
-I'll distract them with the gun. Listen. -Sam!
translation.ko: 총 줘, 내가 유인할게! - 샘! - 조지아, 잘 들어

translation.en: This is the only shot. If they chase me, you can get away.

translation.ko: - 안 돼! - 강에서 봐, 내가 따돌릴게

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. I can outrun them. -Sam!
translation.ko: - 안 돼! - 강에서 봐, 내가 따돌릴게 샘!

translation.en: If you don't want them to catch you, come with me now.
I can help you, but you have to come with me.
Is it safe to speak here?
How have they not found this place?
You ever hear of Karel Čapek?
And what does that have to do with anything?
In it, a man, scientist, tries to create new life.
translation.ko: 거기에 나오는 과학자가 생명을 창조하려고 하지

translation.en: Prove that there was no God.
were these artificial creatures with living flesh and blood components.
Essentially what the modern android is.
They look like us. They talk like us.
And it's commonplace to mistake a Roboti for a human.
translation.ko: 그래서 로보티를 인간으로 오해하는 일도 많지

translation.en: And at first, they seem happy to serve man.
translation.ko: 처음에는 기꺼이 인간을 모시는 것 같더니

translation.en: a Roboti rebellion leads to the extinction of human life.
This play introduced the word "robot" to human language,
and it ends with our extinction.
We knew what was coming the second we gave it a name.
translation.ko: 이름을 붙이는 순간 어떤 일이 벌어질지 알면서도

translation.en: But sure, let's build million-dollar butlers
and assume it's all going to be okay.
I'm alive because I know how they think.
What happened that night, the night of the Blitz?
translation.ko: 그날 밤 어떻게 된 거예요? 기습이 있던 날에요

translation.en: They were supposed to be programmed not to kill us.
What went wrong was we built them in the first place.
You need to forget about your friend.
I'm sorry for what you're going through.
But you need to get with the program here.
And they've jumped the evolutionary chain.
They've hacked our programming, and they'll use it against us until we're all dead.
translation.ko: 그들은 우리 프로그램을 해킹했고 그걸 이용해서 우리를 죽일 거야

translation.en: "Hacked our programming." What do you mean?
We're not robots. You can't hack us.
translation.ko: 우리는 로봇이 아니라 해킹할 수 없잖아요

translation.en: I know it sounds dumb, but that's what it is.
translation.ko: 한심한 소리 같지만 그걸 해킹한 거야

translation.en: Human beings are programmed through hormones and primal urges
translation.ko: 인간은 호르몬과 충동으로 감정의 교류를 원하게끔

translation.en: It's what kept us alive this long.
translation.ko: 그 덕에 여태껏 살 수 있었어

translation.en: But an android doesn't have that.
They don't have self-preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.ko: 자기 보호 본능이 없어서 자신을 희생하거나

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
They can reason past sentiment and emotional bond.
translation.ko: 그들의 사고는 감정과 정서적 유대를 뛰어넘어

translation.en: I can't leave him to die.
They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
Why do you care so much?
You were headed to Boston, right?
I can get you there. I can get you there safe.
About eight years ago, we started developing camouflage algorithms
for our complex in Eastern Europe.
Androids see UV, heat sensors, night vision.
translation.ko: 안드로이드는 자외선을 보고 열을 감지하고 야간 시력까지 갖췄어

translation.en: But this algorithm created a mask against all of that.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 알고리듬은 그 모든 걸 차단해

translation.en: -[Georgia] That makes you invisible? -To the eye.
translation.ko: 투명 인간이 되나요? 눈에는 안 보여

translation.en: But they can hear you. They can smell you. They're not stupid.
translation.ko: 하지만 놈들이 소리는 듣고 냄새도 맡지 AI는 바보가 아냐

translation.en: They know this tech exists, so they look for it.
But it gives us a shot.
camouflage or whatever you wanna call it,
it gives me a chance to go and get him.
translation.ko: 이게 있으면 샘을 찾을 수 있잖아요

translation.en: I'm not letting you take my armor for that.
translation.ko: 내 갑옷을 그런 데 빌려줄 순 없어

translation.en: It doesn't matter. Either way, I'm gonna go get him.
I really did try to help you.
What are they doing to them?

translation.ko: 저들을 미끼로 쓰는 거지 누굴 유인하려고요?

translation.en: He won't be the only one they've captured.
You'll need one for him if you wanna get him out of there.
translation.ko: 샘을 데리고 나오려면 하나 더 챙겨야지

translation.en: Are you sure this thing works?
You find him, and you put this on him.
Get him out of there, and you do it silently.
You have four miles till you get to the edge of no-man's-land.
They won't stop until they detect the EMP radius signal. Understand?
translation.ko: EMP 반경 신호가 잡힐 때까지 놈들은 멈추지 않을 거야 알았지?

translation.en: Or you could just walk away.
You could walk away right now.
[man] Let me out! Let me out!
-What did they do to you? -G, get out of here.
translation.ko: 놈들이 무슨 짓을 한 거야? - G, 여기서 나가 - 저기요

translation.en: -[chain clinks] -[man] Hey! -Shh. -[man] Please help me out.
You don't understand. You don't understand.
They're right there. Please. Be quiet.
translation.ko: 놈들이 코앞에 있잖아요 조용히 해요 - 도와줄 거예요? - 그만, 제발 조용히 해요!

translation.en: Stop it. Be quiet. Please be quiet.
translation.ko: - 도와줄 거예요? - 그만, 제발 조용히 해요!

translation.en: -I can help you. Let me out. -Wait. Stop.
translation.ko: - 시끄러워요, 제발요! - 내가 도와줄게요 - 제발 조용히 해요 - 내보내 줘요

translation.en: Hey, come here, you fucking piece of shit!
Hey! Hey, come on. Just help me out.
If you don't fucking help me, I'm gonna scream.
And every single one of those motherfuckers is gonna come in here.
translation.ko: 그러면 저 망할 놈들이 전부 들이닥칠걸?

translation.en: Hey! Get me out of here. Come on!
[doctor] He's been through a lot, but before we talk about Sam,
translation.ko: 고생이 많으셨는데 샘도 샘이지만 먼저 보여드릴 게 있어요

translation.en: I think we should talk about this…
He collapsed after getting you here.
They're gonna want to talk to him when he wakes up.
[doctor] He got you through the checkpoint.
Caused quite a fuss with the soldiers.
But when they saw you were midway through delivery and unconscious,
translation.ko: 그런데 당신이 출산이 임박해서 의식을 잃은 걸 보고

translation.en: we got you in here and performed a C-section.
[doctor] It's a nice change having some life here.
Some base personnel are gonna be coming by to ask a few questions, security related.
translation.ko: 기지 요원들이 몇 가지 질문을 할 거예요 보안 문제로요

translation.en: I told them that you need your rest, but they just need to clear some things up.
translation.ko: 쉬셔야 한다고 했는데 몇 가지 확인이 필요하다네요

translation.en: The base nurse should be in here.
Yeah. Let's go say hi to Daddy.
Come here. Give me your little hand.
You wanna say hi to Daddy?
I think we can all agree
my plan to get us here was a stunning success.
translation.ko: 여기로 오기로 한 내 계획은 대성공이다

translation.en: You haven't even seen the worst part yet, G.
Okay, there's really not a funny way to tell you this, but…
Why'd they do this to you?
It was the best they could do.
They said we'd know in a few days if I'm gonna be okay,
translation.ko: 앞으로 괜찮을지 며칠 두고 봐야 한다는데

translation.en: but I just got to take it easy for now.
But soon as we get to Korea,
I'm for sure getting some of those robot feet.
Because it's what dads are supposed to be.
He feels like Forest to me.
And the guy who brought you here?
Arthur. I don't… I don't know his last name.
-[soldier] So you came from? -[Georgia] Central Mass.
translation.ko: 원래 사시던 곳이… 매사추세츠 중부 쿼빈 근처요

translation.en: we ended up making it to Philly before we looped back up.
translation.ko: 우린 필라델피아까지 갔다가 다시 돌아서 올라왔어요

translation.en: We were trying to get out of the country with the Family Initiative.
We heard that they were still getting people out of Boston. Is that true?
translation.ko: 지금도 보스턴에서 사람들을 보낸다던데 - 사실인가요? - 네, 맞아요

translation.en: -Can I speak with you about-- -Oh, we're not done.
-Okay. -So how'd you meet the guy, Arthur?
Well, I guess I'll start with the--
We had to get across the no-man's-land.
And we didn't wanna risk giving birth there.
So we found this dirt bike, and we decided to use that to get across,
translation.ko: 근데 오토바이가 있길래 그걸 타고 건너가기로 했죠

translation.en: and we only got halfway before we ran into some androids.
I hid, but they… they took Sam.
They held him prisoner. They had a… a house full of prisoners.
translation.ko: 샘을 포로로 잡았는데 그 집엔 포로가 가득했죠

translation.en: So how'd you meet this guy, Arthur?
He was in the woods when it happened. He…
He took me back to his truck. And he…
Well, he helped me figure out a way to get Sam out of the house, and so I…
I went in, and I got him.
I mean, you probably saw it on the truck already. But he…
Uh, he used to work at… Raster Robotics.
um, a programmer, and he built this…
It makes you invisible to them.
You put it on, and it makes you invisible to the androids.
translation.ko: 그걸 입으면 안드로이드 눈에 안 보인다고요

translation.en: He told you it makes you invisible?
I went in, and I… and I went into the house, and I wore it…
You just walked into the house, and they couldn't see you?
translation.ko: 그 집에 들어갔는데 놈들이 당신을 못 봤다고요?

translation.en: I'm telling you that it does because I wore it, and it worked.
And I'm telling you if that existed, don't you think we'd be using it?
translation.ko: 그런 게 있으면 우리가 왜 안 쓰겠어요?

translation.en: So you need to start straightening this story out so it starts making sense.
[Arthur] Human beings are programmed to have emotional connections.
translation.ko: 인간은 감정의 교류를 원하게끔 프로그래밍돼 있지

translation.en: [sobbing] They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They don't have self-preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.ko: 자기 보호 본능이 없어서 자신을 희생하거나

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
[distorted] They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
I think I made a mistake.
Sam, get up! Sam, get up!
Come on. Sam! You gotta wake up.
I'm gonna come back. I promise.
-[soldier 1] Go, go, go, go! -[soldier 2] Breach! Breach!
It's okay. Don't cry. Be quiet. Mama's here.
What are you gonna do with that?
[sobs] They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead.
We were programmed to be emotive to make you feel comfort.
translation.ko: 우리는 감정을 자극하고 인간을 위로하도록 프로그래밍됐어

translation.en: Boston's going down today. You can't stop us now.
translation.ko: 보스턴은 오늘 무너질 거야 넌 우리를 막을 수 없어

translation.en: So, are you gonna disable that EMP for me?
Or you going to make me kill your baby?
translation.ko: 아니면 내가 네 아기를 죽이게 할 건가?

translation.en: -[woman speaking Korean] -[Georgia] Over here! Wait! -Wait. Here! -[gate rattling]
[woman] He's going to scan you. Do not move.
I… I don't know what paperwork you might need or…
We don't… we don't have anything, but I just--
[Georgia] I… I know that you only take the mothers.
I can only take the baby.
Korea will only take the baby. Not the parents.
translation.ko: 한국은 아기만 받습니다 부모는 안 돼요

translation.en: You can take us. It's only three of us.
I… I promise I will do anything.
-Please take us. -[woman] It's not just the space.
translation.ko: - 제발 데려가 주세요 - 죄송합니다 자리만 문제가 아니에요

translation.en: Another person to take care for medical attention.
When you get to Korea, you will need a job.
translation.ko: 한국으로 가면 일자리도 구하셔야 할 테고

translation.en: You will need a house. You see?
I'm gonna make it work. I'm gonna get us on the plane.
translation.ko: 내가 어떻게든 해볼게 비행기를 구하든 배에 타게 해줄게, 약속해

translation.en: I'm gonna get us on the boat, I promise.
translation.ko: 비행기를 구하든 배에 타게 해줄게, 약속해

translation.en: I don't think I'm gonna pull through this, G.
translation.ko: 나는 안 될 것 같아, G

translation.en: -We'll be fine. -Just listen. Just listen to me.
there's a good chance he'll die.
there's a good chance he'll live.
Look at me, G. I'm fucked.
I don't think I'm fully pulling through this.
And you can't really protect him. Not really.
translation.ko: 너도 아이를 지켜줄 수 없고 그건 힘들어

translation.en: This could be a good thing.
Can I just have one minute? Just one minute, please. Just…
I didn't want any of this for you.
translation.ko: 엄마는 일이 이렇게 되길 바라지 않았단다

translation.en: I would have done anything to give you a normal life.
translation.ko: 네가 평범하게 살 수 있게 최선을 다했을 거야

translation.en: You would have gone to school in the city that you were born
and come home and told us about your day.
[Georgia] We would have taken summers on the shore.
And that's where some of the most intense memories of childhood would have been.
translation.ko: 그건 네 유년기의 강렬한 추억으로 남았을 거야

translation.en: [Georgia] Your father would have read to you in silly voices.
translation.ko: 아빠는 웃긴 목소리를 내며 책을 읽어주고

translation.en: You would go to sleep dreaming of the adventures
you would have with your friends in the woods.
[Georgia] In the perfect world, none of this would have happened.
translation.ko: 세상이 완벽했다면 이런 일은 없었을 거야

translation.en: [Georgia] We would have worked to be the best parents we could have been.
translation.ko: 우리는 최고의 부모가 되고자 노력했을 거고

translation.en: We would have been a family,
and the world wouldn't be falling apart.
But I can't give you that.
I can't give you any of it.
I'm going to give you the only thing that I have left.
A chance at a normal life,
with a new family in a new place.
[Georgia] I need you to know that I love you.
I need you to know that I wanted you.
God, I wanted you in my life. I…
I wanted you by my side.
Please let me finish this. I'm almost done. If you just--
translation.ko: 조금만 더 쓰게 해주세요 거의 다 썼어요

translation.en: Please find someone who will take care of him.
-He's gonna be okay. -He's gonna be okay.
translation.ko: - 아이는 잘 살 거야 - 아이는 잘 살 거야

translation.en: -He's gonna be okay. -He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay. He's gonna be okay.

translation.ko: - 아이는 잘 살 거야 - 아이는 잘 살 거야

translation.en: He's gonna be okay. [Sam] He's gonna be okay.
translation.ko: - 아이는 잘 살 거야 - 아이는 잘 살 거야

translation.en: They're setting up a new base there. We're bringing whoever we can find.
translation.ko: 새 기지를 세우고 있는데 최대한 많은 인원을 데려갈 겁니다

translation.en: Do you wanna come with us?
